A general view of the U.S. Capitol after sunset in Washington, Tuesday, Feb 8, 2022. (AP Photo/Mariam Zuhaib)
Authorities have lifted a lockdown order at the scene of a sniper ambush that killed two firefighters after they found the body of a man with a firearm nearby. Police say firefighters were ambushed by sniper fire while responding to a blaze in a northern Idaho mountain community.
Shipping containers are seen ready for transport at the Guangzhou Port in the Nansha district in southern China’s Guangdong province, April 17, 2025. (AP Photo/Ng Han Guan, File)
A Russian drone attacks a building during Russia’s massive missile and drone air attack in Kyiv, Ukraine, Tuesday, June 17, 2025. (AP Photo/Efrem Lukatsky)
